mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice_tb ( notice_no, notice_title, notice_content, notice_poster, notice_date ) VALUES ( notice_seq.NEXTVAL, #{notice_title}, #{notice_content}, #{notice_poster}, #{notice_date} )
mapper.select: SELECT notice_no, notice_title, notice_content, notice_poster, notice_date FROM notice_tb WHERE notice_no > 0 ORDER BY notice_no DESC, notice_date DESC
SELECT notice_no, notice_title, notice_content, notice_poster, notice_date FROM notice_tb WHERE notice_no = #{notice_no}
